user.description: OPTIONAL: the user this guild member represents

joined_at.description: when the user joined the guild

premium_since.description: OPTIONAL: when the user started boosting the guild

deaf.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels

mute.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels

pending.description: OPTIONAL: whether the user has not yet passed the guild's Membership Screening requirements

permissions.description: OPTIONAL: total permissions of the member in the channel, including overwrites, returned when in the interaction object
